      static byte[] CryptoTools.encryptWithPassphrase(java.io.Serializable object, java.lang.String passphrase, byte[] salt)
      encrypt a serializable object using the given passphrase an salt make sure to use real random salts e.g. via the CryptoTools.generateSalt() method
